name: The Kick Dip
description: Looking to spice things up? Loaded with flavor, this will keep guests happily munching as long as it lasts. Thanks to Lisa Hiscock, a Consultant in Newfoundland, CA, this kick’n dip has got game.
preparation:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, Ranch Dip Mix, Guacamole Dip Mix, Nacho Cheese Dip Mix and Poco Picante Salsa Mix.
  2. Serve with your favourite veggies and dippables!
tips:
Prep ahead! Cover and refrigerate dip up to 5 days. Seasonings “bloom” as the dip sits. Stir in hot water or milk to thin, if needed.

For a lighter option, substitute Greek yogurt for sour cream.
